# focusSystem

**Instance Property**

The focus system that’s responsible for the window scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var focusSystem: UIFocusSystem? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is `nil` if the window scene doesn’t support focus.
title: focusSystem
